name: Garage Kids
summary: Garage Kids is a French animated television pilot that was produced by Antefilms in 2001 in both France and US. It was the original concept for the French animated television series Code Lyoko, which was released in 2003 and 2004 in the US.
info:
• 中文名: 车库儿童
  • 话数: 1
  • 放送开始: 2001年
  • 片长: 5:00
